username.description: Username that will be used to authenticate against InfluxDB server

default.description: Sets the retention policy as default retention policy

database_name.description: Name of the database where retention policy will be created

hostname.description: The hostname or IP address on which InfluxDB server is listening

replication.description: Determines how many independent copies of each point are stored in the cluster

duration.description: Determines how long InfluxDB should keep the data

password.description: Password that will be used to authenticate against InfluxDB server

port.description: The port on which InfluxDB server is listening
